name: Robusto
additionalNotes: My name is Enrique Galvez (Don Kike). I was born in San Luis, Pinar del Rio, Cuba and from an early age I began my work in the field starting with planting to harvesting Tobacco. In 2007 I moved to Tampa Bay FL and since then I have been making cigars for most of the cigars shops in Ybor City.
